column3:
La Galeria Toni Tàpies presents an exhibition entitled Plena consciència where you can see a selection of pieces of Antoni Tapies 90s and 2000.

+info

column2: Mar Arza - R E S Q U I C I O
column3:
"Changing noticeably its course, the bend signals a point of inflection; a turn in the curve that queries the path taken. The surface revealed folds in on itself, and in this act of folding a sliding into the depths occurs. The fold is the text, the nuance and shadow of a feeling that comes into relief."

+info
